events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday evening involving another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the incident.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the evaluation and next steps.
We have received your accident claim and will begin processing as soon as possible.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage and a copy of the police report to proceed.
All requested documents including police report and photos have been submitted successfully.
The investigation team has started reviewing all materials and vehicle inspection reports.
The investigation is complete and the findings have been documented for decision making.
A settlement offer regarding the repair costs and damages has been proposed for your review.
We have received your feedback on the settlement terms and will consider your concerns.
Your claim has been approved based on the evaluation and agreement on settlement terms.
The settlement payment has been processed and issued to your registered account.
Your claim has been officially closed after successful payment and case resolution.
All claim documents and communication have been archived for record keeping and future reference.
